content.raw:
I'm so sorry for the noise, you're correct, the function is already documented above. Maybe I was looking at it too quickly and didn't see the usual `//////...` above the implementation... I blame it on the bad cold I'm having this week :grin: I confess I haven't spent much time navigating the integration tests, it probably has a style slightly different from the rest.

Sorry for all the style-related comments, I should be looking into the actual functionality soon :wink:
